Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. logo

mLtWG-fjqjKFNR4eqvqzyw.text: Came to this bar because it was in the mall connected to our hotel, and because it advertised a drink deal of 3 drinks for $10, which in Vegas is a good deal considering I have paid $55 for 2 drinks in the past.  Came here in a Thursday night and the bartenders, Casey and Kayla, were amazing!!! They worked great together on a busy night. Because they were so good and the convenient location, we returned on Saturday. BIG mistake!! Antonella, another bartender, served us and was horrible!!! Asked to speak to the manager and she said she was the manager, so I asked for a corporate number and her name. She pointed to a man sitting at the other end of the bar and said he was the owner so I asked to speak with him. The owner, tony, approached us a few minutes later and asked about our experience, which we were honest about and he cut us off after trying to charm us and walks away! gave this place three stars only because the girls at the bar were excellent and had amazing attitudes even though the second time Casey was working with the lazy a** Antonella who was only walking back and forth acting like she was busy - Casey ran the entire bar!  Vegas is an ever changing and evolving place...Tony (owner) needs to appreciate hard working people like Casey and Kayla because he might not be in business long by having people like Antonella "running" his business. May not come here again next visit to Vegas, since it may be out of business

SZB0CUij13MdeD5MLdYPRQ.text: Great food great price $4.99 all lunches till 5 - 3 for $10 cocktails, you don't get this anywhere back home, happy to have found this place at proximity to our resort

0HYTIyruAMiY_ndDeEdj9Q.text: This is one my favorite place for me best friend and i to go when we are in vegas. The service is really fast and the food is always delicious. They have the best homemade strawberry jelly. If you are ever in vegas, i highly reccommend this place.

ZCBukvtPPR69F2iaM5PMBw.text: Bad service; surprisingly they don't do any substitutions if you don't eat any meats. Sad

ec0fesHqPwKaLiPxkS5zMg.text: We went here after seeing Vegas The Show at Saxe theatre and we were attracted to the specials that were advertised outside of this establishment  The food was not good. Three of us had their $6 burger special.  The bun tasted stale and like styrofoam.  The burger itself was okay but not anything fancy.  One of my girlfriends had their chicken pasta dish and she hated it.  My other girlfriend had their margherita pizza and she was not pleased. Service was horrible.  Our waitress had no sense of urgency and did not refill our drinks regularly and after looking around, we came to the conclusion that we were not alone.  The dining room was not very busy at all but it seemed all the of the other diners like ourselves were twiddling their thumbs because of the disappearing waitress that we all had.  The dining room felt dead.  Don't bother going here. It looks pretty and clean from the outside but it's probably because business is slow. Don't waste your time.

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. False advertising. Tasted like virgin drinks. I guess you get what you pay for :P

EQ-oqek4UPk7P2U4T1Augg.text: The good news is for $10.00 you get 3 mimosas,as opposed to one for $7.00, inexpensive breakfast, Good location to my hotel.  Will I return yes, I like the price.

mhQRswQnJDaa1FFfNvOLtA.text: The $3 frozen drinks were fun, service was pretty fast with bringing out our food, a little slower once we needed a check. We ordered the chicken wings which were good, the goat cheese salad was okay, and the chicken and mushroom pasta. Pretty average and the prices were good.

mp-7RGRtKknxJQZ8pCPfBQ.text: I read a lot of reviews for this place. Ate here 5 times for their $4.99 lunch. The full lunch menu is for that price. The wife really loves their salmon and she's very picky when it comes to fish. The penne pasta is tasty. The burger is ok and fries have never been fresh. The skirt steak was good but not great. The pizza was good for two people for a quick bite (dinner only menu). The tacos are ok and messy. The 3 for $10 drinks special is good (per person, can't share). Give it a try for lunch.

s_XDYjPcBrzxBPYf9hKcGA.text: Nothing special.  It's ok.  Food is priced reasonably considering it's in Vegas.  Wanted to go to BurGR but line was crazy so stumbled here.  Ended up going to BurGR the day after.  Food is ok, service needs to improve a lot.  Dining room feels dead.  When you place plastic cartons in sight of the dining room, that tells me you just don't care.  The mandatory 18% gratuity tells me you are not confident in your service so we will force you to pay us a good tip.  Confident places don't force this cause they know their service is good.  Hardly ever got a refill.  Was given attitude cause we didn't order desserts.  Food was ok.  Portions are big.

UkUEZ5gIH7g-Fuo4rV--Bg.text: 1 hostess..no managers in sight..10 minute wait to sit down for no reason.....in addition to the waitress not knowing what was on the menu. Food tastes microwaved... New staff and menu recommended...terrible service! Go to Jack in the box instead...better food and don't have to tip for terrible service!!!!!!!

QXnuwkF3SOv1QVvcwC6TTQ.text: Came across this place.  Awesome prices would make you think you would be getting sub par food.  So glad this was not the case.  It was great food and the 3 martinis for $10 didn't hurt!

AJ1c3j7x2NdGJHPlMLSKBg.text: Very affordable and delicious!! 3/10 cocktails and wine, $3 beer and everything is $5 for lunch. I had the warm goat cheese salad with white wine. Hit the spot!  My daughter had the salmon and mashed potatoes...$5!  A must do. We sat outside and could watch the rainstorm.

jtnYoHoYnOela0zu1VjMGQ.text: Service great, food great, fast seating, and amazing prices.  Every visit to Vegas includes breakfast here, often more than once.  Manuel takes great care to make sure we have a great experience!

wHZjZcM2zN8jT6Rh6igAig.text: This restaurant had the best food I have eaten our whole trip to Vegas. They not only have great food they gave great service and the prices were beyond resonable. They also have great drink specials and the ambience was nice. This restaurant will be a must go on every visit we make to Vegas.

2oP4GBdxCLPHOOozldFdDg.text: Came in for their lunch special. Amazing value $4.99 for the entire lunch menu. I ordered the grilled chicken club which was tasty. Service was fast and prompt. They also have a drink special 3 for $10 haven't ordered any cocktails this time around but will b in the near future.

4XdKErOS7Z0etU_UEbb2Dg.text: HORRIBLE!! DO NOT EAT HERE!! WORST SERVICE, HORRIBLE FOOD, CHEAP OWNERS, waited a good 10mins just for a cup of water, when the restaurant was EMPTY! And the waiters had no respect for customers talking loudly about nipples. Really?!  Oh and whats with the white butcher paper used as tablecloths? ?!! Are they really that cheap?!!  Seriously save your money and AVOID THIS PLACE at all costs.

qVTLnznz4ZIqFoL1Lx8ZgQ.text: EXPECT TO BE IGNORED. Advertise 4.99 lunch menu. I arrived at 3pm and lunch was still being served. Fancy restaurant but no services. Got seated at table and waited to be served. 10 mins went by without being noticed. Left restaurant without anything. Partly fault of idiot girl at front that seats people in unserved areas.

CdQo-_tNWAKlevPfwSpRUA.text: Food was delicious service sucks bill was electronic couldn't get a receipt waitress was very rude didn't want to wait good on us cause we were a party of 2

pb2w8p_m5FgtydAnwkll4A.text: You get what you pay for, its too busy and no staff. Nice drink prices didn't have a daquiri which kind of was lame. I liked the egg rolls.

l_RCykA2jOLTBCEJUB_S5A.text: Ronnay and Cody were amazing!!! They made my experience so fun! I would definitely come back to see them! Especially ronnnay she's so sweet and amazing !

VDxZwlHy9lcVQyRe4-ySpw.text: Wow what a find!!! 8.99 breakfast, 3 for 1 cocktails, lunch starts at 4.99 and dinner is at a normal price. Cocktail deals are available all day and night! When we are back at the strip this will be a go to for sure! Two breakfast with two sides of biscuits and gravy, 6 cocktails (3 for 1) with tax was $40.00 .

b1GXEe1mtWNiY1jj1QxqDA.text: Get ambiance and delicious food, like gourmet  for the price. $5 meals and $3 drinks. Amazing. Also the drinks are great. We will be back

tASgsTHY0T2hQpjzbRXSiA.text: First time eating here, food and service was excellent.  Will definitely return when back in town.

Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Dinner Menu for Ocean One

xaaGX0sAsbewsoUK6JUKSw.text: Yay! I am HONESTLY a fan.  A friend mentioned Oncea One Bar and their awesome drink and food specials.  I was at Crazy Girls but refused to buy a drink NOT when just down the stairs and around the corner I can get 3 drinks for the price of 1...SHUT THE FRONT DOOR, I'm going to get some DRINKS!  The show had not started, so I had enough time to go hang at the bar.  It's advertised throughout the Miracle Mile and Planet Hollywood, how can you NOT go check out this AWESOME drink special.  Oh yea, and there's food too, but I just went for the drinks this time around.  Kind of busy, but room at the bar.  When sitting at the bar select appetizers are $7.50 and martinis/cocktails/wine $10(3 for 1 special), drafts $3, daiquiris/soda $3 (soda free refills)    Yea, so let's jump on this 3 for 1 deal, this is the kind of thing that you tell yourself : 'it's too good to be True, I have to check it out'. $10 - 3 drinks, skeptic at first; I've experienced deals like this where the cost is LOW and so are the QUALITY of the drinks and service, it's a toss up.  This is not the case here, I asked THE question: "Do all 3 drinks have the be the same?"  Cody politely said no, not at all.  I just did an internal scream, where on the strip can you find a deal this good and they serving nice, skrong drinks, oh yea, they re pouring very nice over at Ocean One, so don't be stingy on the tip.  I had the Watermelon Jolly Rancher and the Black Pearl, the jolly rancher tastes just like, so I had 2.  It was really good, When I go back I 'll be sure to have some Watermelon Jolly Rancher candy on deck.  And #3, the finale was the Black Pearl, a blackberry liqueur tea, 2 bottle mix TOPPED with champagne.  A nice topper indeed, bill $10, AWESOME.    Great atmosphere, an outdoor patio set-up, very open restaurant. The place was already full when I walked in, by the time I was paying my bill there was a line to get in.  You can honestly have a nice evening w/ self and/or w/ friends, drop $20 and your evening is smooth sailing.  Awesome customer service, I probably was at the bar no longer than 2mins before I was acknowledged by Cody.  He said he'd be w/ me in a moment, but as he was finishing up w/ his customer Casey swooped right in to greet me and ask if I was being help.  AWESOME customer service, good team work, just really nice to see that companies and their employees still treat customers like CUSTOMERS!  The bar got full, however I witnessed each and every customer that came up to the bar of walked away from the bar was GREETED and given 100% customer service.  4STARS b/c I have yet to taste the food, this review will be updated.

7SI2CYhQvt-1aGO5qYR_uw.text: Lunch everything is 499 and three drinks for the price of $10 you can't beat it the food is amazing large portions very clean music is nice this service is a little bit slow I noticed they have all male waiters but very friendly definitely would recommend to anybody and the food was delicious and the drinks were strong

O0ZejSh1SOVZMrUESORsEA.text: Probably one of the best lunch deals on the strip with drink specials to boot, Ocean One Bar and Grille is a super budget-friendly spot to grab a bite.  It's tucked away in the Miracle Mile Shops but worth seeking out because everything on the lunch menu is $5. Yes everything. Yes $5. Choose from a variety of apps, salads, sandwiches, wraps, burgers, pastas, or even entrees like grilled salmon or marinated skirt steak. I had the rare ahi tuna wrap and thought it was decent. The tuna was perhaps a little sinewy but I'm not complaining for the price. Liked the wasabi aioli on the Asian slaw. To top it all off, the drinks are so cheap. All the beers were $3 and they have a ridiculous all-day drink special of 3 cocktails for $10.  I sat at the bar and found the bartenders to be polite and attentive. Decent service and not too crowded - overall just a great place to rest my feet and grab a bite and drink.

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Rare ahi tuna wrap with fries

PvPVZjqlTiraaxuFoanDbg.text: Every time me and my parents go to Las Vegas I always go here and get the Orecchiette Pasta which has Artichoke Hearts, Chicken, Lemon Garlic Sauce,  Tomato, etc. I also like the Warm Goat Cheese Salad although I don't eat the salad I just eat the goat cheese (because I hate salad.)   The atmosphere was very noisy a lot of people were talkative but I didn't care because nothing stopped me from listening to my parents or the tv.   The service was great the lady that served us was very very nice I like the way she gives us drinks first and then food because if she gave us the food first and then the drink I would get really thirsty.   This place is my personal favorite because it has my most favorite food in the whole world which is the Orecchiette Pasta Its the best value on the strip because its only five dollars for an entree and appetizer.

-MHk-H2-hBA6BQj87OOf-w.text: Food is excellent! Service was super great. Lunch was 4.99 but its portions and taste are 30 dollar plates

5hmO5kXeK0bOz0njKy1BLQ.text: Pretty good food for a great price if you go for the Happy Hour special. Even better if you order online. Menu is pretty varied from Mexican to America to Italian and of course sea food. I did not care at all for their quesadilla, but pretty much anything else is good. For some reason, their online menu is very hard to navigate through and confusing, looks like it was designed and written by a 15 yr old, with many spelling mistakes and disorganized. But the bottom line is that is the best value on the strip and you cannot argue about anything else, seeing what a bargain their menu items are....

geMs5V6xQ5M5uilpSYBe1w.text: If you're looking for gourmet dining, this is not for you.  However, if you're interested in a great value on the Strip with dishes starting at $4.99 and cocktails are 3 for $10.  The restaurant always looks busy but we were seated quickly.  Service is friendly and quick.

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States

8pwL1lJLSW8SqdhxSscySg.text: Decent food, great for breakfast with inexpensive drinks. The 3 for $10 cocktails is very worth the walk over from Park MGM. Very happy we ventured this way.

lMhh1wTZ7wPQ2tqK6pGXKg.text: Oceans grill has great quality food for a very reasonable price, you cant beat the 5 dollar lunch menu and 10 dillar 3 drink special.easy access in the Miracle Mile...Try it you will be very pleased.

SzY1unm9P3G1Zbi71yUkjQ.text: Lexi is the greatest bartender on earth. I came into the establishment with high service expectations and she met every last one of them. This place is so amazing and it hosts the best happy hour in town.

trgJMvXKN5teqlUb9C44lQ.text: This is one of our favorites by the Elara hotel. Every meal we have had has been excellent. 3 drinks for $10.00....cant be at it, with top shelf alcohol. Its located in miracle mile. The value is the beat in Vegas.

fYksEMYubSKzC5xc0YXbGA.text: This place has amazing food! Great options for a low price. It's cheaper than eating breakfast back home in an ihop! The waitress we had, Elvira, was very sweet and made sure she got our order right and made sure our water glasses were clean. It took a little bit to get a water refill but the place was very busy and she was a great waitress so I don't think that was on her. I got biscuits and gravy which were easily some of the best I've had, my parents both got something different than I did and we all liked everything we got. I would absolutely go here again!

5CsbmGKkOYeM3JZBdNBx9A.text: For $5 the lunch is very good. The portions are not huge but I thought it was just right. If you're starving you may want to order some appetizers   Beef tacos with chips and salsa  Ahi tuna wrap with coke slaw Chicken Club sandwich with French fries   The iced tea and coke was $3 each  The food is very nice quality

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Uv4E8QiSfF7NkFytuZoEZw.text: While staying nearby at Elara we went out on New Years Day in search of sustenance and I was craving some pancakes.  Being New Years Day in Las Vegas, we'd gotten a late start and we arrived at Ocean One at 11am.  They have a menu that says everything is $5, so we thought, what they heck, lets try it.  I've probably walked past this restaurant HUNDREDS of times so it was time.     The first disappointment was that by the time they came to take our order it was 11:10 and they said sorry, no more breakfast.  That was a bummer. I ordered the burger and I was surprised to find that for $5 it was a good sized burger and tasted good!  The fries that came with it, though, were horrible; lukewarm and soft and dried out like they'd been sitting around for a long time or microwaved or something.   I passed on those.  The husband had an order of wings and an order of tacos.  He liked both.  The food was surprisingly good.     The biggest problem was just the TERRIBLE service.  Took  forever to take our order, took forever to get our drinks refilled after we finally got someone to send our waiter over.  When we got our food we had no silverware or napkins and when we asked one person, he said okay and disappeared, never to return.  We finally got our waiter's attention and once he came to us, he wandered all over the restaurant looking for silverware.  It was SO weird.  Same thing when we tried to pay...   My husband chatted with the manager on our way out just to let her know, but it was really bad.  I guess I'd eat there again, but it wouldn't be my first choice because there are so many places to eat right there.  Although, I might hit up the bar for the three drinks for $10 deal some time!

6EMvCblGhZvML10GvuCkNA.text: The food here is delish and their happy hour on Saturday was all day. Nice dishes to choose from for $10.95 and portions were good. atmosphere was good.. located off the main (side) entrance.

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Oysters, Crap cakes and Pasta

2AV_pMhz9wlYv8ZAme30vQ.text: Had to send the grilled chicken back twice because it was raw. Cheap drinks are always worth a trip though!

ZpZUweSbIqbhAa8x3arVXw.text: Love this place & we typically order off the bar menu/apps.   Always 3 for $10 drinks!   Must haves on bar menu:  Wings  Crab cakes Tuna with wasabi  Shrimp egg rolls  (spicey)   4 stars on the review because I feel like some regular menu items could be so much better,  I love the potential here at Ocean One.    Service is awesome & we have our favorite bar-tender of course!

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Watermelon martini! Yum.
Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States

OjNX8KLuatOSQkiricAyAg.text: Good place for lunch.  They have some Great lunch specials.  We had to wait a long time for the food to arrive, but it was good.  Service is why they didn't get 5 stars.  Great place for families.

zQB026A5oqbB7Rs_dS5V3w.text: Amazing. Amazing. Amazing. Total hidden gem.   They sat us quickly despite the long lines and the food was delicious!!! Drinks weren't watered down, service was quick and friendly, and everything was tasty. I really loved the ahi tuna. Can't beat the prices.   Definitely put Oceans bar on your Vegas list.   I think the lunch is a better deal than breakfast and I'd love to their dinner!

zf4B-TvmN1dL3R8bKkuKoA.text: Unbelievable all lunch plates for $5 , I ordered Island Salmon Salad, Orecchiette Pasta, Marinated Flank Steaks, and House Made Desserts all plates so delicious.  Service very nice and fast served. Best Restaurant environment. Gotta come back again!!! I love this restaurant.

PvxAeFWxTI063KI4g_isfQ.text: Absolutely no sense of urgency.  3 bartenders, 3 customers, I'm waiting 5 minutes for acknowledgement, WTF? Great prices for the strip. Great atmosphere with lots of tv's.  Descent food, after a slow start, a good finish. Would have been 5 stars if the greeting was quicker. Even just a "hi, be right with you ", would work.

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States

pcVW5nIt2iutX-ZxhERXMw.text: Good for the price. Smallish serving sizes but for $5 who cares? Slow service on food but they kept the drinks coming. We got the poke as an appetizer... Was a little bit nervous about raw fish at those prices but was yummy and my tummy was fine?

fQHFOuBxkvTBf4A-dAbT4Q.text: Right across from Elara hotel with quick seating and service. If you're looking for an outback type of experience this is it. Service was ok, food was average, but there are a ton of tvs around if you're trying to watch a game.

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States

gpBuFiLitOrxJ_V5WeTmFw.text: I had never even heard of this place when my friend brought it up and now, if I ever go to the strip to party, I am definitely stopping by here first because you seriously cannot beat 3 drinks for $10.  This is not 3 cheap drinks, this is three quality cocktails for one cheap price.  The deal was so nice we did it twice  Yes, 6 potentially knock you on your butt drinks for $20.  No gimmick!    Because of the drinks we of course had to order some food.  The menu isn't crazy extensive and the quality isn't top notch but the food did the trick and like the drinks, was pretty decently priced.  I got a hamburger, fries, and a ceasar salad and my friends got a quesadilla and a some spicy pasta and we all enjoyed everything.    The place is huge and there are tv's everywhere but it's not a sports bar.  Our waitress was super cute, very friendly and bubbly, and made our visit even better.  I'll definitely be going back.

wS-7AgDnTq38tQSOwMDtcg.text: I've walked by this restaurant several times now that I'm a new local to the Vegas area. We finally stopped in randomly last night after a Jimmy Kimmel TV taping and we were starving. I ordered fries just to munch on before our meal came-they were all so soggy I'm not sure if that was intended but they were almost microwaved-but we were so hungry we didn't want to wait longer for a new crispy order. I asked how the mushroom risotto was and the waiter said they don't have that so I pointed to the menu & said it's right here on the menu.  Guess either he was new or the item was new but shouldn't your staff KNOW what you sell?  (The ranch was actually really good for the fries. That sadly was the best part of the meal) When I ordered Filet Mignon I asked for a side of sauteed spinach instead of the vegetables. Spinach side was TINY! Maybe 2-3 bites worth. Vegas came dumped all over anyway on top of the mashed potatoes when I said NO Vegas. Not the end of the world but I didn't want them. My steak was ordered butterflied and "well done"-then I ate 1/2 and the other 1/2 (@$9 worth) was red-medium inside: that's NOT well done. This drives me Insane. I told the waiter and he said he'd tell the chef or he could re heat it..I mean he never came back so my guest was already finished with their meal so I just gave up on 1/2 my filet mignon-wasted $$ not happy. Overall I was disappointed-the steak would have been good had it been cooked properly. Why doesn't a chef comprehend the difference btwn medium and well done? Ugh very frustrating. Sad when locals are always iso places to go to & tell visitors to check out but you can't send them to a place you genuinely had a negative experience at.

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu #2...Server didn&#39;t even know they sold mushroom risotto..? Alrighty then.
Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. It &#34;looked good/ well done&#34;...that&#39;s all the spinach I got I said NO Veges. Ugh
Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu

YGgcNWl13hViovy5rXR2tA.text: Can't go wrong eating here when everything on the strip is quite expensive.  We've been to restaurants where we've made reservations months prior to visiting, paid top chef prices and ended up disappointed... perhaps also because we've set very high expectations.   However,  at Ocean One, we've set no expectations, just that every entree on the menu for lunch is $4.99; and...... it's decent and totally worth it.  Beer is $3 and cocktails are 3 for $10 and make sure you save room for dessert (it's probably the best) By the way, just because it's cheap doesn't mean you order everything on the menu like we did...it's not a buffet.   The entrees are "normal" portion so don't assume the price point is low, the portion is small.

lSMsv4_KIWBlyzi43_Hmdg.text: it was definitely a variety of foods for everyone but I got the overwhelming feeling that a lot of things tasted very bland. That's not always a horrible thing and sometimes I wonder if it's my mind tricking me and my taste buds playing with my fears. But I'm a serious note you'll get full, and you'll leave happy. Bring the family as well if you dare

MMUrTS9NYC9l7R-vNoiMzQ.text: I went here for drinks and have zero complaints.  For Vegas or actually for anywhere their drink specials are phenomenal.  3 drinks for $10.  Seriously.  On the strip.  The cocktails aren't the best, but for just $4 more, you can upgrade the liquor to what they consider to be premium.  This was indeed a good cheap time and the next time I'm in Vegas, I'll be back.

TEx-nVFPgVYVuPaalfTcNQ.text: This place is basically like the Great Value of "fine dining" the "Up & Up" of mediocrity. Service is very fast and very wrong. Not much of what I ordered arrived as expected. I should have known from the beginning when I ordered a Caesar salad and the waiter asked if I wanted ranch with it. What kind of satanic monster puts ranch on a Caesar salad, didn't matter anyway bc I received a garden salad instead. My waiter looked right in my face and handed me an incorrect salad and then proceeded to ask if I needed anything else. Ummm yes? My salad lol? Next I ordered a bacon cheeseburger because I'm fancy ya know. Ordered it medium rare, received a topping less beyond well done Krusty Crab patty also without bacon. Oh, forgot to mention their Calamari is basically a spaghetti appetizer that they've replaced the linguine noodles with shaved calamari pieces. Literally can't make this stuff up. Lastly my fries arrived very fast and very cold so to suffer thru this experience I requested a side of sauce, set me back a dollar. This place has fantastic drink specials that would give Applebee's a run for their money. I would encourage them to make JUST drinks and for you to avoid dining here unless you're into well plated hole in the wall bar food.

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Dinner Menu

bPKW130jklGV5vQIa2cpnw.text: Mario Romero was awesome he was very attentive and we didn't have to ask for a thing! The food was AWESOME and we will definitely be back tomorrow!!!! Thanks for your GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE MARIO!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Tacos
Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ZS1-TxOgTlnPKQ26ge_aZQ.text: Wanted to give this restaurant a 5  but I think they forgot about us. we ordered our food and it took so long. 3 tables  got there food before us and some look like they had the same plate we got.    1. 5 star  for the food   2. 5 star  for the waiter  3. 5star portions small but good food for the price

lAxZGKsAJTyxt-teb-0AAA.text: I want to start off by saying our server was very nice.  Today was NFL kickoff to the season and it's my boyfriend's birthday and he's a diehard fan.  We asked several times to switch a tv to see the kickoff, and had already ordered food and drinks under the impression that they could show the game.  Unfortunately they don't have the package so our game couldn't be shown.  It would have been great for the manager to tell our server up front this was impossible bc they don't have the package.  We had to get everything to go.  On the up side the 3 drinks for 10 bucks is as cool and food was yummy.  Just disappointed in the lack of communication about the game situation.

MgyfR1ZU6jBDA2wZvARDsA.text: What a steal!  We passed by this restaurant on several visits and finally decided to try it due to their great advertisement right at their entrance.  Lunch is $5!    This seriously has to be one of the best deals on the strip.    A jamba juice will cost you $9 easily or a slice of pizza for $8 or an orange juice for $5, etc - so instead of paying premiums everywhere else, you can get a whole meal for $5 with sit down service? Sold!  With prices this low, you can order a gang load of food if you wanted. Order yourself a drink, an appetizer, entree, dessert, go wild.  Plus, their hours are so great that you can't miss their deals - lunc ends at 4pm, which is perfect for Vegas night owls!  Dinner is cheap also - which I believe is $10. Also, you can get 3 drinks for $10.  So you get the idea now, everything here is cheap.  Now as far as the food and service go, it's not great. So you are getting what you pay for.  But this is a nice find and good option to have especially after you spent so much money on gambling, shopping, and expensive dinners.  Location: inside Miracle Mile Mall on a corner

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States

7EA6mB4b_ocXNRFXmcST1w.text: I went here a couple of weeks ago with my girlfriends before a show at Planet Hollywood. Restaurant was cute but omg it was literally so hot inside I thought I was going to pass out. I spoke to others in the restaurant that felt the same way. Food was decent. Honestly the best part was the drinks. Drinks were 3 for $10 - such a bargain! And they were super delicious.

rfh0WtSZYKdOjixE3ET1Sw.text: Food is Amazing Drinks are Amazing the Price is Outstanding!! Especially for the big portioned DELICIOUS food!!! Only negative is the servers the ladies are MEAN and Rude.

EUg0GBYXnms9g2qda2OvjA.text: I've been here a handful of times but this would be my first review (how could I forget??! Omg). Ocean One Bar and Grille has one of the best alcohol deals on the Strip. 3 for $10, blows me away every time. For the baller on a budget I really recommend this place if you want to blow your date away. Seafood/Italian/American AND some Vegetarian options. I love this place, my go-to for dining on The Strip hands down!  This place is super romantic, they train their staff to have the patience of saints and try their best to give really good presentation of the food. And the drinks are fantastic!

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States

j131p2IOlaMPW8LeGM5cdQ.text: I went in to this place looking for something to eat after a show I watched, as I was starving. I was seated to a table relatively quickly, and the waiter took my drink order. The waiter was pretty snotty and had an attitude for no apparent reason, did not seem like he enjoyed his job. He did not comeback for refills which was a bummer, and I kept having to ask someone else for one. I got one of the penne pastas, it was decent at best. It was a good portion but got cold fast and the bread was very hard, it also did not taste very fresh. My aunt was also with me, and her food did not come until like 15 minutes after I finished mine, and it was a pretty small plate with ravioli. The place was fancy and had great decor. The wings with teriyaki sauce was really good and was great in flavor. Overall this place has decent food but needs to work a little better on service.

photos.caption: Photo of Ocean One Bar and Grille - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Teriyaki Wings
